name: Essay Writer 5000
description:
BRONZE MEDAL AWARDED IN ‘HUMOUR’

INTRODUCING ESSAY WRITER 5000. MAXIMUM REALISM. You have only 12 hours, REAL TIME GAME PLAY, to write a 500 word essay.

You have to write an essay. You cannot leave the room except to go to the bathroom. A myriad of distractions await… Will you survive the hauntings?

  • Entry for Ludum Dare 37, created in 48 hours.
  • Ranked #3 out of 901 entries in humour category.

What others are saying about Essay Writer 5000:

“the most unique game I’ve seen…, great job!” -slimabob
“I don’t often laugh at the games I’m playing, but this one did it.” -djfariel
“lalalalalala Modern Art!” -Artsicle
